amendment.description: To establish a spending-neutral reserve fund relating to authorizing Federal permitting for manufacturing and energy construction projects relating to national primary or secondary ambient air quality standard for ozone lower than a certain existing standard.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 795 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 795 proposed by Senator Cassidy. (consideration: CR S1882-1883; text: CR S1882) To establish a spending-neutral reserve fund relating to authorizing Federal permitting for manufacturing and energy construction projects relating to national primary or secondary ambient air quality standard for ozone lower than a certain existing standard.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 795 proposed by Senator Cassidy.
